pullrequest.title: Start porting release process to GitHub

content.raw: The Linux build is failing because we need more changes inside the release-tools scripts.  Is the sdformat9-release repo only a test or from now the plan is to have the new ones in github? At this point I’m afraid that we end up with a good mess of -release repositories spread between bitbucket/github with the risk of having duplicates in both. Not sure if it would make things easier to change all them at the same time.

Is the sdformat9-release repo only a test or from now the plan is to have the new ones in github? At this point I’m afraid that we end up with a good mess of -release repositories spread between bitbucket/github with the risk of having duplicates in both. Not sure if it would make things easier to change all them at the same time.
